results.deck: A chess game featuring extras like puzzles of the day and fantasy-style battles.
results.name: Chessmaster

results.deck: When the beautiful Ann Darrow is kidnapped by the inhabitants of Skull Island, Jack and his team must fight their way through the island's prehistoric inhabitants and hostile environments, solving puzzles and fending off attackers, all in search of her. But unfortunately for them, so is a giant ape.
results.name: Peter Jackson's King Kong: The Official Game of the Movie

results.deck: Best described as Magic the Gathering meets Monopoly, Culdcept is a card based board game in which you gain property, fight monsters, and battle it out for money and power.
results.name: Culdcept

results.deck: The spiritual successor to the original Mega Man series of platformers, Mega Man X features a more technologically advanced hero and a darker storyline (set a century after the adventures of the original Mega Man).
results.name: Mega Man X

results.deck: Join former SAS soldier Andrew Sterling as he takes on a group of arms dealers with access to a missle guidance system.
results.name: Cold Winter

results.deck: Sonic Heroes introduces a character-switching mechanic, with teams of three characters each dividing the work of smashing robots and saving the world between themselves, and with each character contributing their specialty to the team: Speed, Power, or Flight.
results.name: Sonic Heroes

results.deck: The second installment of the Darkstalkers franchise refines both the original game's story (adding two new fighters) and gameplay (including an improved "super meter" system where characters can stock up on multiple meters and can perform enhanced moves at any time).
results.name: Night Warriors: Darkstalkers' Revenge

results.deck: An action platform game starring Donald Duck.
results.name: Disney's Donald Duck: Goin' Quackers

results.deck: The sequel to Fifa Street, featuring more tricks and gameplay modes than the original.
results.name: FIFA Street 2

results.deck: SingStar Svenska Hits is a installment in the SingStar franchise created solely for Swedish audiences.
results.name: SingStar Svenska Hits

results.deck: Be prepared to put those plastic, LEGO lightsabers to work as you rebel against the Galactic Empire in LucasArts' second installment of the LEGO Star Wars series.
results.name: LEGO Star Wars II: The Original Trilogy

results.deck: The story of a forsaken boy with horns and a mysterious girl who must work together to escape from the confines of an enormous castle.
results.name: ICO

results.deck: Sol Divide is a fantasy-themed shoot-'em-up from Psikyo.
results.name: Sol Divide

results.deck: EA's Need for Speed series returns for it's second iteration of illegal street racing in Underground 2. New to this game is the ability to roam around an open-world city,newer racing modes like Street X and URL and much deeper customisation.
results.name: Need for Speed Underground 2

results.deck: Jak is left stranded in the desert by the last counciller of Haven City and is now on a quest for revenge and redemption.
results.name: Jak 3

results.deck: A baseball game from Treyarch and EA Sports.
results.name: Triple Play Baseball

results.deck: A game based on the Corvette car.
results.name: Corvette

results.deck: "NiGHTS into Dreams..." is a 3D flying game made by Sonic Team for the Sega Saturn. You play as Nights in order to stop the evil Wizeman and his minions.
results.name: NiGHTS into Dreams...

results.deck: Radilgy is a vertical shooter with its own unique graphical design taking inspiration from anime and the look of cel-shaded graphics.
results.name: Radirgy

results.deck: Players compete in monster truck rallies as well as races through large destructible environments as any of the big name trucks such as Big Foot, Gravedigger, Maximum Destruction, and even Monster Mutt!
results.name: Monster Jam

results.deck: AFL Premiership 2005 is based on the widely popular sport of Australian Rules Football.
results.name: AFL Premiership 2005

results.deck: Drive one of many vehicles of destruction through three cities on your way to become overlord.
results.name: RoadKill

results.deck: Players aim to establish themselves as a world-renowned b-boy or b-girl in this breakdancing game for PlayStation platforms.
results.name: B-Boy

results.deck: With its trademark replica sniper rifle, Silent Scope offers an interesting twist on the traditional on-rails, light gun shooter.
results.name: Silent Scope
Walt Disney's The Jungle Book: Rhythm n' Groove

results.deck: EyeToy: AntiGrav is a airboarding game made by Harmonix for the PS2 EyeToy.
results.name: EyeToy: AntiGrav

results.deck: Based loosely on the events of the motion picture, The Spiderwick Chronicles puts you in control as Jared, Simon and Mallory.
results.name: The Spiderwick Chronicles

results.deck: NBA 2K7 is the eighth installment of the NBA 2K series of realistic basketball games, updating the roster to the 2006/2007 NBA season while improving the online play and adding every athlete's "signature style".
results.name: NBA 2K7

results.deck: The first game in the Princess Maker series was released in 1991.
results.name: Princess Maker

results.deck: Soulcalibur III continues the franchise on the Playstation 2. This installment adds a character creator, along with other new features.
results.name: Soulcalibur III

results.deck: Made Man is a mafia-themed 3rd person shooter in which the player takes the role of Joey Verola, a made man in a crime syndicate. The story for the game was written by David Fisher with assistance from the former mafioso Bill Bonanno.
results.name: Made Man: Confessions of the Family Blood

results.deck: Rock Band expands on the concepts Harmonix established in its Guitar Hero franchise by allowing players to play guitar, bass, drums, and sing to a variety of songs from various sub-genres and time periods.
results.name: Rock Band

results.deck: NBA Street Vol. 2 is the second game in the NBA Street series. It continues the over-the-top ridiculous style of the first one while adding a few new aspects to the game play.
results.name: NBA Street Vol. 2

results.deck: Time is running out once again in Time Crisis 3 as the VSSE must neutralise the terrorist threat in this on-rails lightgun game.
results.name: Time Crisis 3

results.deck: Street Racing Syndicate is an Import Tuner racing game that focuses on wowing the ladies
results.name: SRS: Street Racing Syndicate

results.deck: NBA Ballers is a basketball game developed and published by Midway, for the Xbox, PS2 and PSP.
results.name: NBA Ballers

results.deck: UEFA Champions League 20062007 is the official video game of the UEFA Champions League 2006/2007 season.
results.name: UEFA Champions League 2006-2007

results.deck:
This game is based on the third season of the 2003 TMNT series.

In the PS2 and Xbox-versions the TMNT: Turtles in Time Arcade-game is unlocked after completing the first level.
results.name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 3: Mutant Nightmare

results.deck: Scarface: The World is yours, puts you in the shoes of Tony Montana as you try to re-establish your Cocaine Empire and get back the glory days of the past.
results.name: Scarface: The World is Yours

results.deck: Full Spectrum Warrior is based on a game commissioned by the US Army to train light infantry troops in urban combat situations. The game places soldiers in a tense, hostile, and claustrophobic environment where they must complete a variety of military objectives.
results.name: Full Spectrum Warrior

results.deck: MVP Baseball 2005 is a baseball game from EA Sports. This game was EA Sports' last licensed MLB game. The announcers are Duane Kuiper and Mike Krukow.
results.name: MVP Baseball 2005

results.deck: Club football is a soccer game that came out in 18 different editions.
results.name: Club Football

results.deck: Known as Evolution GT in Europe, Corvette Evolution GT is a racing game in which players must raise their stats and compete against opponents to get ahead in their career.
results.name: Corvette Evolution GT

results.deck: Major Kusanagi and Batou take on the high-tech underworld of Japan in this Third person shooter for PS2.
results.name: Ghost in the Shell: Stand Alone Complex

results.deck: A World War II themed action game.
results.name: Panzer Elite Action: Fields of Glory

results.deck: Control Max, a young inventor, and Monica, a warrior princess from the future, as they fight their way through dungeons and train rides to save the world.
results.name: Dark Cloud 2

results.deck: A Cabela's deer hunting game.
results.name: Cabela's Deer Hunt: 2004 Season

results.deck: SEGA AGES 2500 Vol.2: Monaco GP is an arcade racing game where the player controls a racing car in the top-down perspective. The player must prevent their car from colliding into other cars by moving left or right.
results.name: SEGA AGES 2500 Vol.2: Monaco GP

results.deck: PaRappa the Rapper 2 is a PS2 rhythm game that follows PaRappa and his friends on a quest to save the world from  "Noodlization".
results.name: PaRappa the Rapper 2

results.deck: Spiral into phantom dimensions where you will fiercely battle for the fate of the spirit world! Use your powers of flight and fright to become the quickest, smartest & most powerful ghost in the Spirit Dimension!
results.name: Casper: Spirit Dimensions

results.deck: Join the Midnight Club, a group of underground street racers that race for money and power in highly customized sports cars. Midnight Club was also one of the many launch titles for the Playstation 2.
results.name: Midnight Club: Street Racing

results.deck: X-Men Next Dimension is a 3D fighting game featuring characters like Cyclops, Wolverine, Magneto, Rogue, and many more.  It is the spiritual successor to the Mutant Academy games.
results.name: X-Men: Next Dimension

results.deck: Grab your rifle and lock 'n load as you play as a modified green plastic soldier and return to the plastic warfare.
results.name: Army Men: Green Rogue

results.deck: Born of different worlds, woven together by fate, each shall rise to face their destiny.
results.name: Grandia II

results.deck: A spin-off of Koei's Dynasty Warriors series, Samurai Warriors adapts the hack-and-slash gamplay and changes the setting from Three Kingdoms China to Warring States Japan.
results.name: Samurai Warriors

results.deck: Blade II is a 2002 action game based on the vampire/comic book movie of the same name, starring Wesley Snipes.
results.name: Blade II

results.deck: Tekken Tag Tournament is the fourth installment of the Tekken franchise.
results.name: Tekken Tag Tournament

results.deck: Pick a BMX rider and ride around 8 different levels to complete challenges or free ride to do crazy tricks.
results.name: Dave Mirra Freestyle BMX 2

results.deck: The sixth entry, and first straight-to-console iteration, in the fast-paced sci-fi space shooter series, Gradius V implemented 3D models and backdrops, simultaneous multiplayer, online scoreboards, "revival start," and advanced control schemes.  It is the only Gradius game not developed exclusively by Konami.
results.name: Gradius V

results.deck: This compilation includes all of the World Heroes games in one disc.
results.name: World Heroes Anthology

results.deck: Zone of the Enders: The 2nd Runner is a sci-fi action-adventure game produced by Hideo Kojima. The game features fast-paced mech battles and a very elaborate story.
results.name: Zone of the Enders: The 2nd Runner

results.deck: The follow-up to Medal of Honor: Rising Sun returns the action to the European Theater, along with North Africa and Stalingrad.
results.name: Medal of Honor: European Assault

results.deck: Rockstar's most recognisable franchise returns to Vice City,  boasting a new plot, a new cast of characters (and some old favourites), more vehicles and a multiplayer mode
results.name: Grand Theft Auto: Vice City Stories

results.deck: A collection of vintage, real-world Gottlieb tables.
results.name: Pinball Hall of Fame: The Gottlieb Collection

results.deck: Subsistence is an updated version of Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater which contains several new features, most notably a third-person camera and an online mode, Metal Gear Online.  It is extremely hard to find in Europe, as Subsistence in EU is the US Subsistence Limited Edition by default.
results.name: Metal Gear Solid 3: Subsistence

results.deck: Championship Manager 2006 is a soccer management game for the 2005/2006 season. You take control of your favorite soccer teams from around the world and lead them to glory.
results.name: Championship Manager 2006

results.deck: Race through obstacles and battle the clock in this simulation. Collect points to unlock bigger and better remote control helicopters.
results.name: RC Helicopter Indoor Adventure

results.deck: Rockstar swaps gangsters for delinquents in their open-world formula, giving players control of a new student at a rough-and-tumble private school.
results.name: Bully

results.deck: .hack//INFECTION is a pseudo online RPG, with a strange game-within-a-game premise.
results.name: .hack//INFECTION - Part 1

results.deck: Jimmy Neutron: Boy Genius is a tie-in to the movie of the same name.
results.name: Jimmy Neutron: Boy Genius

results.deck: NBA 2K3 is the fourth installment of the NBA 2K series of realistic basketball games, updating the roster to the 2002/2003 NBA season while adding online multiplayer (for the PlayStation 2 and Xbox versions) and co-branding with the ESPN.
results.name: NBA 2K3

results.deck: Released in 2000, ESPN National Hockey Night was the last hockey game published by Konami and was released to generally negative reviews. 2000 Calder Trophy winner and Stanley Cup Champion Scott Gomez graced the cover.
results.name: ESPN National Hockey Night

results.deck: An action and stealth game based on the 1963 Steve McQueen film.
results.name: The Great Escape

results.deck: With the introduction of new features and the refinement of older ones, SvR '06 still stands as one of the most enjoyable games in the series.
results.name: WWE SmackDown! vs. RAW 2006

results.deck: In the third installment of the Silent Hill series, a teenage girl named Heather finds herself drawn into the demonic world of Silent Hill after a strange encounter with a detective in a local shopping mall.
results.name: Silent Hill 3

results.deck: The sequel to Jak and Daxter: The Precursor Legacy adds free-roaming elements and vehicles, and takes on a darker, more violent tone.
results.name: Jak II

results.deck: Tekken 2 is the second game in Namco's popular 3D fighting series. It was praised as every fighting game fans dream.
results.name: Tekken 2

results.deck: Rayman Arena is a party game featuring Rayman. Up to four players can run through race tracks or compete in an arena.
results.name: Rayman Arena

results.deck: An action-RPG by tri-Ace that tells the story of Jack Russell, an impudent young man who wants to become a knight and serve the kingdom of Radiata. It is notable for its broad selection of side-quests, and a large cast of characters who follow unique schedules.
results.name: Radiata Stories

results.deck: Tokyo Xtreme Racer 3 is the fourth installment of this Japan-based street racing series.
results.name: Tokyo Xtreme Racer 3
Dr. Seuss' The Cat in the Hat

results.deck: Bikini Beach: Stunt Racer is a trick based driving game where players must collect diamonds and "score big" to woo a female of one of four ethnicities. The game features 12 open arenas, 12 stunts and 4 locations.
results.name: Bikini Beach: Stunt Racer

results.deck: Play as Will Turner, Elizabeth Swann, and the infamous Captain Jack Sparrow in this video game adaptation of the third film in the Pirates of the Caribbean franchise.
results.name: Disney's Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End

results.deck: A Game Boy Advance entry in the popular soccer management series.
results.name: Premier Manager 2005-2006

results.deck: The 2002 release in Sega's football franchise. It was one of the first PS2 games to support online play.
results.name: NFL 2K3

results.deck: SpongeBob SquarePants: Revenge of the Flying Dutchman is a video game, inwich SpongeBob and Gary unleash a curse upon Bikini Bottom that brings The Flying Dutchman back from the grave.
results.name: SpongeBob SquarePants: Revenge of the Flying Dutchman

results.deck: A light-gun shooter released by Sega in 1994. It was the first texture-mapped 3D shooter, and went on to have a lasting impact on the rail shooter and first-person shooter genres.
results.name: Virtua Cop

results.deck: Using the Duplication 3000 machine, Plankton creates an army of robots to invade Bikini Bottom. Help Spongebob, Patrick and Sandy thwart Plankton's evil plans and save the day.
results.name: SpongeBob SquarePants: Battle for Bikini Bottom

results.deck: Take a host of ghosts and show the people of Gravenville who's boss!
results.name: Ghost Master
Robin Hood: Defender of the Crown

results.deck: The sequel to the original Deer Hunt game.
results.name: Cabela's Deer Hunt: 2005 Season

results.deck: Tribes: Aerial Assault is an online FPS released in 2002. It had a pretty big cult following for several years, but recently it's become a rarity to see anyone playing it online at all.
results.name: Tribes: Aerial Assault
